title: Network connection keeps dropping off on Google Pixel 3
content:
Hi

I am on Vodafone UK and since updating to Android 9 (continued in Android 10), my network connection is extremely unstable on the Google Pixel 3.

I need to restart phone to get a temporary connection, which then drops off a few minutes later. I have got a new SIM from Vodafone, but issue still persists.

I have also tried using the SIM on another phone (Samsung S9) and network does not drop.

I have also done a hard reset on phone, and the issue still persists. 

Any advice?? I want the Pixel 4, but won't stay on Google if this issue cannot be solved =(
